title: Apartment For Sale In Colombo – 03
details:
APARTMENT FOR SALE IN COLOMBO – 03 (19th Lane)

Three bedrooms, three attached bathrooms

Balcony, Living area, Dining area, fully fitted pantry & fully Air-conditioned, Ceiling fans, Hot Water etc

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.

Please call for more information
